meaningMnemonic: A big <kanji>mix</kanji> of folks forming a kind of <kanji>riot</kanji>. You'd think this would be something more violent, but it's really just an <vocabulary>orgy</vocabulary>. Lots of mixing, I guess, and not very much organization on the orgy-organizer's part, at least according to this kanji sequence.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
